Description: Papyrus. Demotic accounts. Six fragments, only one of which is substantial. Torn on both sides and top and bottom. The text on the recto consists of the ends of 12 lines of text in column 1 and 11 lines in column 2. The text on the verso has the traces of 6 lines in column 1 and 12 lines in column 2.
Curator's comments: In the text on the recto a number of individuals are mentioned and the names regularly preceded by check marks. The text on the verso is very faded.
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: deposit, displaced fragments, distorted, frayed, loss Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: kraft paper Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
Acquisition name: Purchased through: B A Seaby Ltd
